Introduction: A new face. I see.#$b#They call meJio. Better not ask too many questions.
spring_12: I'll hide among the eggs tomorrow. Don't try and look for me.$h
spring_23: I'll be among the flowers. Don't look too closely.
summer_10: I'll sneak in to taste the soup tomorrow. It had better be good...
summer_27: The beacons.$u#$b# It's the signal.$4#$b#Tomorrow night... Hmm...
fall_15: Don't bother looking for me tomorrow. You'll never find me.
fall_26: I can go undercover tomorrow. Don't try and find me, it'll be a waste of your time.$h
winter_7: It's hard to hide in snow like this, unless you know where people never look....
winter_14: I get to meet some old friends tomorrow.$h
winter_24: A holiday break tomorrow, huh?#$b#Sounds neat.
Wed: Don't follow me.#$e#You'll regret it if you try.
Fri: You don't see me. I'm just an illusion.
Mon2: Hm? You're here again?#$e#Don't follow me.$a
Wed2: Are you not busy?#$e#You seem to have a lot of time on your hands.
Fri2: Don't touch my stuff.$4#$e#Don't you dare.$a
Sun2: Don't come any closer.$4#$e#What did I just say? Begone.$a
Mon4: You don't give up, do you?#$e#Interesting...
Tue4: Ugh.#$e#I'm fine, it'll stop bleeding soon.
Wed4: Don't touch that.$4#$e#It ain't for children!$a
Fri4: Don't follow me.#$e#How many times do I have to tell you?$a
Mon6: I have work to do.#$e#Don't bother me.
Tue6: Why are you here again?#$e#Do what you need to and get going.$a
Thu6: Don't touch that, you'll hurt yourself$4#$e#Does that look like fake blood to you?!$a.
Fri6: Do you know Marlon? If you do, go to him.#$e#Why? So you don't bother me.$a
Sun6: Do you have a deathwish?#$e#Get out of here.$a
Mon8: Come on, Kiwi.$h#$e#Oh, it's you. What do you want?
Tue8: You seem like a reasonable person.#$e#Maybe there's some merit in letting you accompany me.
Wed8: I saw you exit the mines the other day with some loot.#$e#It seems you're capable of combat yourself.$h
Thu8: I'm in a hurry. Can't talk..$4#$e#Why? None of your business.
Fri8: This job ain't for the weak.$a#$b#What, you think you're strong?#$e#Hmm. You might be worth something to the Dusk Force. Come back when our boss is around.
Sat8: Beware of Denver, If you know him.$4#$e#Don't go out during the night.
Sun8: Beware of Lunna, if you know her.#$e#She is not what she seems to be.$4.
Mon10: We've got a job to finish.#$e#Want to tag along?
Tue10: You're trustworthy enough. Keep your mouth shut about what you saw, you hear?#$e#Let's not speak of this again.
Wed10: *mumbling* Speed.. I am speed.$h#$e#What?! When-- Why are you here?! $a
Thu10: Beware of the old man who works at the water research facility.#$e#He's stuck working there for a reason.$4
Fri10: This land has old secrets..#$e#You don't want to know.#$e#Just enjoy life as it is while you can.$h
Sat10: Don't go wandering off into the ridge at night.#$e#Trust me.$4
Sun10: The unseen blade is the deadliest$4#$e#Always flank your enemies..
spring_1: The cold fades with the coming of the warm southern breeze. It seems calmer now.
summer_1: There's energy brewing under the earth .
fall_1: The spirits are getting louder. Be careful.
